de.mslab.utils

Class GaloisField

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mslab.utils.GaloisField

  • public class GaloisField
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a galois field (GF) and defines modular addition and multiplication in it. A field of GF(N) requires to specify a reduction polynomial and a field size N.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_FIELD_SIZE
      A field size of GF(2^8) is the most often used field size for byte based system
      static int DEFAULT_PRIMITIVE_POLYNOMIAL
      Represents a primitive polynomial 1 + X^2 + X^3 + X^4 + X^8

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GaloisField()
      Default constructor.
      GaloisField(int fieldSize)
      Constructor.
      GaloisField(int fieldSize, int primitivePolynomial)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int add(int x, int y)
      Adds two integers in the galois field, where addition in galois field is XOR.
      int getFieldSize()
      An integer which represents the field size N of the given galois field GF(N).
      int getPrimitivePolynomial()
      An integer which represents a polynomial in bitwise fashion, e. g. 285 stands for the polynomial 1 + X^2 + X^3 + X^4 + X^8.
      int mod(int x, int y)
      Reduces two integers in the galois field x mod y.
      int multiply(int x, int y)
      Multiplies two integers in the galois field.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • GaloisField

        public GaloisField()
        Default constructor. Initializes a galois field GF(N) with the default field size and the default polynomial.

      • GaloisField

        Constructor. Initializes a galois field GF(N) with the given field size N and the default polynomial.

           int primitivePolynomial)

    • Method Detail

      • getFieldSize

        public int getFieldSize()
        An integer which represents the field size N of the given galois field GF(N).

      • getPrimitivePolynomial

        public int getPrimitivePolynomial()
        An integer which represents a polynomial in bitwise fashion, e. g. 285 stands for the polynomial 1 + X^2 + X^3 + X^4 + X^8.

      • add

        public int add(int x,
      int y)
        Adds two integers in the galois field, where addition in galois field is XOR.
        Parameters:
        x - Expected x >= 0 and x < fieldSize.
        y - Expected x >= 0 and x < fieldSize.
        Returns:
        The XOR of x and y.

      • multiply

        public int multiply(int x,
           int y)
        Multiplies two integers in the galois field.
        Parameters:
        x -
        y -
        Returns:
        The product of x and y.
